title: Somerville, Davis/Meacham 2RMs-1BR, NO FEE, Avl 9/1  2250 w/utils
posting_body: In the heart of Davis Sq!!
The Davis Sq T & Somerville Theater are at the end of the street.
Less than 2 minute walk to the T and all the action of Davis Sq!
Bright & Airy, 2 Room apt, Kitchenette, Living room, One nice size Bedroom, laundry on site, Apt has a very homey feel.
and is in a well kept, older victorian house on quiet tree lined Meacham Rd.
Sunny LR with large triple windows that let in lots of light.
$2,250 includes Heat & All Utilities, may be possible parking for one car offstreet.
Available Sept 1, No Fee or Last Month held, only Security Deposit.

No Smoking, No dogs, Cat OK Please no emails, I can't check them as often as I'd like and there will be a delay in getting back to you, also information about the apartment and appointments for showing cannot be made by Text.
